Patron saints

A set of interconnected short stories following characters haunted and helped by a supernatural presence.

Battlecrier
Bertie Horner joins his first battle. The small statue that his mother sent off with him for protection offers that, but at a cost.
Read

Word count: 2500 words

Warnings for: violence, brief mention of animal death

Spilt Blood
Ned Metzger picks up a small stone statue lying on the road and with it an unexpected companion surprisingly well suited to his work. Follow up to Battlecrier.
Read

Word count: 5000 words

Warnings for: violence, sexual content

All's Fair
Ned and his companion encounter an old enemy of the spirit. Follow up to Battlecrier and Spilt Blood. Set after Spilt Blood.
Read

Word count: 500 words

Warnings for: no warnings
